Articles.Content:
<Hello everyone! have you notice the AMAZING improvevments on landscapes??? i couldn't stop fling around the mountains and there are so many places to go!!!! simple amazing.

So here the challenge:

find the the place in kerbin where your kerbals would spend holidays and share it!!!!

Rules:

2 screenshots of the place

1) from a top view let say about 5-10km

2) land with a flag planted!

i don't care how you are going to reach the the place, by boat by a rover plane, hot drop it or crash on it with a rocket the only restriction is that all must be done without MODS. ALL STOCK.

the prize? well i'm sorry but all i can share is the little SSTO you see in the picture above. ( 2500m/s Dv once 70-100) for the first 10 and a 30 tons lifter for the first 3 most amazing places. ( hey better than nothing ) hope you are going enjoy the seek for the most amazing places in kerbin!.

i'll be the only judge of this challenge as for the prize and as for the idea. for now limited to kerbin, once completed we will move along another planet!

meter of judgement:

50points the place

30points the fun

20points the craft ( no needs to upload the file )

10 Bonus points the landing ( or the crash ) added only if something special.

1)Dynamo

2)

3)

4)

5)

6)

7)

8)

9)

10)

remember this challenge is has been made to honour the great job that Squad iis doing for our fun, clap clap clap.

the lifter:

Edited July 28, 2013 by Rosarium

Nice challenge, i raced to file my attempt. I immediately dropped Jeb into my signature aircraft, my Aero X-1, to christen the Field Dynamics Ski Resort. Still compatible from its 20.0 configuration, i thought it would handle just as it did. However, since it required SAS to fly in .20, i had a rude awakening as i left the runway. Ladies and gentleman, be aware that the photographer for these shots had to grapple with an entirely new SAS system on the fly to bring you these shots! I did manage, however, to make to my destination, wallowing around in the sky. Landing... was a problem. Jeb wrestled with the controls as a SURDOVPIF (Sudden Unplanned Rapid Dissambely Of Vehicle Parts In Flight) occured, bringing only his cockpit to a safe stop (sorry, no pics of the crash). I did not quicksave, so i didn't get the shots i wanted, but these are close enough:

In the Northern Mountains, on the main continent, lies the site for the future Field Dynamics Ski resort, perched near a mountain lake, and right below the main attraction, the Krakenhorn, a impossibly tall snowcapped beast of the earth (Fun for kids, too!). These are the groundbreaking photos!

On the way there! (Note: only pic of plane fully assembled XD)

The groundbreaking site. Krakenhorn lies in the background.

An overlook of the ski area, and the mountain lake.

Craft Download here!

User beware! This thing was barely tested for .21 flying with the new ASAS. It is not a perfect flyer, and the tail has a huge tailstrike hazard on landing.

P.S. If i can design a sled, i will take it there

Edited July 28, 2013 by Dynamo

Dynamo, no problem with the craft and its handle we have a different sight to judge the .craft: here we have a more artistic-functional judge over a technical one.

ok let's say: the place, you makes me dream about a refreshing holiday in mountain's lakes. the place is really good one i really appreciate. it reach 40/50points.

the fun: well what to say? i found it fun ( even if jeb looks so serious) 15 points for it

the craft: i can say its a nice design aircraft, simple but detailed. but in the whole of possibilities its remains a standard vehicles even if made with cure like this one. So i think i canno't give more than 12 points to your craft.

as finally as Pioneer of the challenge you receive 5 more points.

TOT 72
